text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Neon glows in the night
Everyone's out having fun
Lost in rhythms on the run

[Chorus]
Dance away till the break of dawn
Feel the beat and carry on
City lights they're calling you
Shimmering in every hue

[Verse 2]
Crowd is moving on the street
Patterns form beneath our feet
Echoes of a distant song
Pull you back where you belong

[Chorus]
Dance away till the break of dawn
Feel the beat and carry on
City lights they're calling you
Shimmering in every hue

[Bridge]
No need for words just let it flow
In these lights we'll never slow
Heartbeats racing to the sound
In the moment we are found

[Chorus]
Dance away till the break of dawn
Feel the beat and carry on
City lights they're calling you
Shimmering in every hue
title: City Lights
